ComicInfo.Summary:
Sara doesnâ€™t remember her real name. What she does know is that she traded away misery as a former prostitute and became a world-class killing machine.
When a routine hit goes sour, Sara makes a shocking discovery: Suppressed memories, haunting her since childhood, are in fact TRUE! And her REAL family, presumed dead, may actually still be alive.
She begins to wonder about her life that could have been. Is it too late to reclaim her humanity? No one has ever retired from the Cosa Nostra secret service and lived.
MAY NOT BE SUITABLE FOR ALL AGES
